translations: n.金鸡菊类植物，金鸡菊；波斯菊

phrs.translation: 金鸡菊属, 金鸡菊, 菊属, 一种一年或两年生草本观赏植物
剑叶金鸡菊, 大金鸡菊, 线叶金鸡菊
大花金鸡菊, 金鸡菊
两色金鸡菊, 蛇目菊, 金鸡菊, 波斯菊

sentences.sentence: Coreopsis wildflowers bloom on the Texas coastal prairie.
sentences.translation: 金鸡菊野花开花在德克萨斯州海岸大草原。

sentences.sentence: A hardy Daphne flowers in March, simultaneously with a Coreopsis and two kinds of Litsae with small yellow bells.
sentences.translation: 耐寒的月桂树在三月开花，同期开花的还有金鸡菊以及两种花序呈黄色喇叭形的木姜子。

sentences.sentence: These wild flower have sun flower, coreopsis, small chrysanthemum, still have very big one part does not make go up the flower of the name.
sentences.translation: 这些野花有太阳花、波斯菊、小黄花，还有很大一部分叫不上名字的花。
